Articles.Content:
Kraken.

My Hill.

Ground anchor.

My hill.

Coin toss.

**MY HILL.**

Another Coin toss.

My Hill.

B2, I sunk your battleship.

**MY HILL.**

What?

Roll a D1.

Got a 1.

**MY HILL**

C9, I sunk your frigate.

**MY HILL.**

C4, get blown up.

**MY HIll.**

Queen takes Knight.

**MY HILL.**

Other Knight takes Queen.

**MY HILL**

Hill? What hill?

<iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="113" width="200" data-embed-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ESyh1eirBQ?feature=oembed"></iframe>

I go off and make my own hill.

My new hill!

My knight takes your Knight, puts King in Checkmate, doesn't get distracted by Bulldozer as I am not [@Ben J. Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/204948-ben-j-kerman/)

**MY HILL.**

**TANK BEATS EVERYTHING!\***

**MY HILL!**

\*[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69HwZ2nqrCA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69HwZ2nqrCA)

Tank gets filled with warm water and tropical fish.

**MY HILL.**

I quietly wait for the fire to die down. When it does, I will strike.

Making it....

***MY HILL***

~~The Shenanigan family is known for its unpredictable and bad behaviour. They move you away.~~

~~Shenanigan Hill~~

(ninja'd)

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-21T15:19:44Z" title="10/21/2021 03:19  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 21, 2021</time> by kerbiloid**

You forgot to wait for the water to die down next, You slip and slide off the hill.

**MY HILL.** 

(I am off to sleep. Have a good day and study hard so you can afford KSP3 when it comes out. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")  ) That was for [@Admiral Fluffy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/210816-admiral-fluffy/) as Kerbiloid ninja'd me. Goodnight [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/).

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-21T15:20:55Z" title="10/21/2021 03:20  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 21, 2021</time> by ColdJ**

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, ColdJ said:
> 
> 
> Goodnight
> 

Goodnight!

Also,

**MY HILL**

While the owner is sleeping, he's ninja'd by the Shenanigan family, known for their bad habits and unpredictability,

Goodningt, [@ColdJ](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/211123-coldj/).From Shenanigan Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-21T15:22:40Z" title="10/21/2021 03:22  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 21, 2021</time> by kerbiloid**

I slowly sneak in and take the deed to the hill. I bulldoze it and replace it with Starbase 2.

Elongated Stainless Steel Hill

###

I construct indestructible shield around hill with infinite life support and no entrances or exits.

it also has a time stopping device to prevent temporal shenanigans and to stop me from aging  or being killed.

my hill

While you're busy fighting for the hill, i build a new one and take it for myself. Then i destroy the previous hill by hacking into it and using its self destruct system.

**MY HILL**
Hack'n'Hill
